document.full_text: gruesome photos of michael jackson's autopsy should not be shown to the jury in the involuntary manslaughter trial of the pop singer's doctor, defense attorneys argued in court papers released on thursday.
document.title: lawyers want grim jackson autopsy photos excluded from trial
lines_and_colors: gruesome photos of michael jackson's autopsy should not be shown to the jury in the involuntary manslaughter trial of the pop singer's doctor, defense attorneys argued in court papers released on thursday.
